memberdef.argsstring: (b2PointState state1[b2_maxManifoldPoints], b2PointState state2[b2_maxManifoldPoints], const b2Manifold *manifold1, const b2Manifold *manifold2)
memberdef.name: b2GetPointStates

detaileddescription.para: Compute the point states given two manifolds. The states pertain to the transition from manifold1 to manifold2. So state1 is either persist or remove while state2 is either add or persist.

briefdescription.para: Determine if two generic shapes overlap.
